<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Ratfolk Grenadier](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3164)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Grenadiers use alchemical techniques and stealth to defend their communities.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Ratfolk_Grenadier.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Ratfolk Grenadier](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3164)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=769" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 289 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +10; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Ysoki](/Languages.aspx?ID=61)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +12, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +7, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Alchemical Grenades** The grenadier carries 6 alchemical grenades that deal either acid, cold, or fire damage plus 2 [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and 2 [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=699) damage of the same type (typically two of each). The grenadier replenishes these each day using scavenged materials.

**Items**
[Alchemist's Toolkit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2702), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (20 bolts), [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +9 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 60

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hand crossbow +12 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
alchemical grenade +13 ([range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)),
**Damage** 2d6 acid, cold, or fire plus 2 [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=86) and 2 [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=699) damage of the same type

**Cheek Pouches**   A ratfolk grenadier has stretchy cheek pouches that can store up to 1 cubic foot of objects (though no more than 4 light items). The ratfolk can remove or store an item using the Interact action. As long as the ratfolk has at least one object in their cheek pouches, their speech is noticeably difficult to understand.

**Quick Grenadier** <actions string="Single Action" />  The ratfolk grenadier draws an alchemical grenade with an Interact action and throws it as a ranged Strike.

**Quick Stow** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The ratfolk grenadier stores one held item of light or negligible Bulk in their cheek pouches.

**Swarming**   A ratfolk grenadier can end their movement in the same square as an ally that also has this ability. Only two such creatures can share the same space.

</column>
